static int __devinit probe ( struct pci_dev *  dev,
const struct pci_device_id *  id 
) [static]

Called when the PCI sub system thinks we can control the given device. Inspect if we can support the device and if so take control of it.

Return 0 when we have taken control of the given device.

  • allocate board specific bookkeeping
  • allocate coherently-mapped memory for the descriptor table
  • enable the board
  • verify board revision
  • request regions
  • query DMA mask
  • obtain and request irq
  • map regions into kernel address space
    Parameters:
    dev struct pci_dev
    id const struct pci_device_id
    Returns:
    0 is the device is reconized
    Return values:
    status The program status.

XXX check for native or legacy PCIe endpoint?

References AltSpecsV2_isr(), Aria5Specs_dev::bar, BAR2, DRV_NAME, PIO_Register::edge_capture, AvalonMM_CSR::enableIrq, Aria5Specs_dev::firstWriteFifo, Aria5Specs_dev::got_regions, Master::id, PIO_Register::interrupt_mask, AvalonMM_CSR::interrupt_status, Aria5Specs_dev::irq_count, Aria5Specs_dev::irq_num, map_bars(), Aria5Specs_dev::masterIdUsed, Aria5Specs_dev::minor, NB_MASTER, Aria5Specs_dev::pci_device, PCI_EXPRESS_REGISTER, PIO_MASTERS_FIFO_IRQS, PIO_MASTERS_STATUS_IRQS, Aria5Specs_dev::pioMasterFifoIrqs, Aria5Specs_dev::pioMasterStatusIrqs, Aria5Specs_dev::revision, scan_bars(), specs_dev_exit(), specs_dev_init(), test_version(), and unmap_bars().

Variable Documentation

struct pci_device_id ids[] [static]
Initial value:
  { 
    { PCI_DEVICE( 0x1172, 0x0005) },
    {  }
  }

Using the subsystem vendor id and subsystem id, it is possible to distinguish between different cards bases around the same (third-party) logic core.

Default Altera vendor and device ID's, and some (non-reserved) ID's are now used here that are used amongst the testers/developers.

int major = 0 [static]

struct FIFO_StatusRegister packed

Descriptor Header, controls the DMA read engine or write engine. The SG-DMA controller core has three registers accessible from its Avalon-MM

DMA Descriptor See Table 23-9. DMA Descriptor Structure of chapiter 23. Scatter-Gather DMA Controller Core or Table 2-1: DMA Descriptor Field Description The SGDMA is not yet used SpecsV2 Translation table PCI-to-Avalon Address Translation
